faqs.question: How to access VPN when working remotely?
faqs.answer:
To connect to the company VPN:
1. Open your VPN client (Cisco AnyConnect or similar)
2. Enter server address: vpn.company.com
3. Use your domain credentials (DOMAIN\username)
4. If connection fails, try different server locations
5. Contact IT if you don't have VPN software installed
6. Ensure your internet connection is stable

faqs.question: Microsoft Teams not working or audio issues
faqs.answer:
To fix Microsoft Teams problems:
1. Check your microphone and camera permissions
2. Update Teams to the latest version
3. Clear Teams cache: Close Teams, delete %appdata%\Microsoft\Teams
4. Test audio/video in Teams settings
5. Restart Teams and your computer
6. Check if corporate firewall is blocking Teams

faqs.question: How to request new software installation?
faqs.answer:
To request new software installation:
1. Submit a software request ticket
2. Include business justification
3. Specify software name and version needed
4. Explain business purpose and urgency
5. IT will review based on security and licensing policies
6. Allow 1-3 business days for approval and installation

faqs.question: Computer running slowly - performance issues
faqs.answer:
To improve computer performance:
1. Restart your computer
2. Check available disk space (ensure >15% free)
3. Run disk cleanup utility
4. Close unnecessary programs and browser tabs
5. Check for malware with antivirus scan
6. Consider RAM upgrade if problem persists

faqs.question: How to set up multi-factor authentication (MFA)?
faqs.answer:
To set up multi-factor authentication:
1. Download Microsoft Authenticator app
2. Log into your account portal
3. Go to Security Settings > MFA Setup
4. Scan QR code with authenticator app
5. Enter verification code to confirm setup
6. Save backup codes in a secure location

faqs.question: WiFi connection problems or slow internet
faqs.answer:
To troubleshoot WiFi issues:
1. Forget and reconnect to the wireless network
2. Check if other devices have the same issue
3. Move closer to the wireless access point
4. Restart your network adapter
5. Update wireless drivers
6. Contact IT if issue affects multiple users

faqs.question: Outlook email stuck in outbox
faqs.answer:
To resolve emails stuck in outbox:
1. Check your internet connection
2. Go to File > Account Settings > Data Files
3. Click on your PST file and select 'Open File Location'
4. Close Outlook and rename the PST file
5. Restart Outlook - it will create a new PST
6. Import emails from the renamed PST file

faqs.question: How to backup important files?
faqs.answer:
To backup your important files:
1. Use OneDrive for automatic cloud backup
2. Manually copy files to network shared drive
3. Use external USB drive for local backup
4. Enable File History in Windows settings
5. Set up automatic scheduled backups
6. Verify backup integrity regularly

faqs.question: Monitor display issues - no signal or black screen
faqs.answer:
To fix monitor display problems:
1. Check all cable connections (power and video)
2. Try a different video cable or port
3. Test monitor with another computer
4. Update graphics drivers
5. Check display settings and resolution
6. Press monitor power button to wake from sleep

faqs.question: Keyboard or mouse not working
faqs.answer:
To troubleshoot keyboard/mouse issues:
1. Check USB connections and try different ports
2. Replace batteries in wireless devices
3. Clean keyboard/mouse sensors
4. Try devices on another computer
5. Update or reinstall device drivers
6. Check Windows Device Manager for errors

faqs.question: How to access shared network drives?
faqs.answer:
To access shared network drives:
1. Open File Explorer and click 'This PC'
2. Click 'Map network drive'
3. Enter drive path: \\server\sharename
4. Use your domain credentials when prompted
5. Check 'Reconnect at sign-in' for permanent access
6. Contact IT for specific drive paths and permissions

faqs.question: Phone system issues - cannot make or receive calls
faqs.answer:
To fix phone system problems:
1. Check physical connections and power
2. Test with a different handset if available
3. Verify your extension number
4. Check if voicemail light is blinking
5. Try unplugging and reconnecting the phone
6. Contact IT for PBX system issues

faqs.question: How to install security updates and patches?
faqs.answer:
For security updates and patches:
1. Enable automatic Windows Updates
2. Check Windows Update in Settings regularly
3. Install critical security patches immediately
4. Restart computer when prompted
5. Update antivirus software definitions
6. Contact IT for enterprise patch management

faqs.question: Database connection errors
faqs.answer:
To resolve database connection issues:
1. Check your network connectivity
2. Verify database server is running
3. Confirm connection string and credentials
4. Test with database administration tool
5. Check firewall settings
6. Contact database administrator if problems persist

faqs.question: How to recover deleted files?
faqs.answer:
To recover deleted files:
1. Check Recycle Bin first
2. Use File History to restore previous versions
3. Check OneDrive/SharePoint recycle bins
4. Use Shadow Copy (Previous Versions)
5. Contact IT for backup restoration
6. Act quickly - file recovery becomes harder over time

faqs.question: Setting up projector for presentations
faqs.answer:
To set up projector for presentations:
1. Connect laptop to projector with appropriate cable
2. Press Windows + P to select display mode
3. Choose 'Duplicate' or 'Extend' display
4. Adjust resolution if image doesn't fit
5. Test audio output if needed
6. Have backup presentation on USB drive

faqs.question: Mobile device not connecting to company WiFi
faqs.answer:
To connect mobile device to company WiFi:
1. Forget and re-add the WiFi network
2. Check WiFi password with IT
3. Ensure device has latest OS updates
4. Try connecting to guest network first
5. Check MAC address filtering settings
6. Contact IT for device registration

faqs.question: Cloud storage sync issues with OneDrive
faqs.answer:
To fix OneDrive sync problems:
1. Check OneDrive status icon in system tray
2. Pause and resume syncing
3. Check available storage space
4. Reset OneDrive: Run %localappdata%\Microsoft\OneDrive\onedrive.exe /reset
5. Sign out and sign back into OneDrive
6. Check for file name conflicts or special characters

faqs.question: How to request IT equipment or hardware?
faqs.answer:
To request IT equipment:
1. Submit hardware request ticket
2. Include business justification
3. Specify exact model and specifications
4. Get manager approval for expensive items
5. Allow 5-10 business days for procurement
6. Coordinate delivery and setup with IT

faqs.question: Development environment setup issues
faqs.answer:
For development environment problems:
1. Check required software versions
2. Verify environment variables
3. Update IDE and development tools
4. Check network access to repositories
5. Ensure proper permissions on project folders
6. Contact development team lead for specific configurations

troubleshooting_guides.title: Complete Password Reset Procedure
steps: Check account status and lockout conditions
Update user account with new credentials
Send notification to user via secure channel
Log security event for audit trail

troubleshooting_guides.title: Network Printer Setup and Configuration
steps: Verify printer IP address and network connectivity
Set up user permissions if required

troubleshooting_guides.title: Email Migration and Setup
steps: Set up email rules and signatures

quick_solutions.solution: Check power connections, try different outlet, hold power button 30 seconds, remove battery if laptop
Restart router, check for background downloads, run speed test, clear browser cache
Try different browser, clear DNS cache (ipconfig /flushdns), check if site is down for everyone
Check file extension, try different program, verify file isn't corrupted, check file permissions
Clear print queue, restart print spooler service, check paper and toner levels
